Description: Joined with EA 10435. Papyrus; Hieratic text; recto: Teaching of Ptahhotep; verso: administrative text. The Ptahhotep fragments are verses: 469-72, 472-92, 494-504, 505-8. The verso shows traces of horizontal register lines.
Curator's comments: The literary text of this manuscript is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Translation of text: R. B. Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and Other Egyptian Poems (1999), pp. 246-72;
See F. Hagen, An Ancient Egyptian Literary Text in Context; The Instruction of Ptahhotep (OLA 218; Leuven; Peeters), 2012, 131-42.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381274) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381274)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary Black ink Displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Checked for loan to Munich 2002 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A
